title: Cycle of the Werewolf
itunes:title: Cycle of the Werewolf
itunes:subtitle: Things get hairy for the Losers as they head to Tarker’s Mills and tear through Stephen King’s 1983 short horror novel, Cycle of the Werewolf. Chapters include: Intro, History (4:20), The Hook (10:30), Cycle Breakdown (30:20), Month 12 (34:...
description:
Things get hairy for the Losers as they head to Tarker’s Mills and tear through Stephen King’s 1983 short horror novel, Cycle of the Werewolf. 


Chapters include: Intro, History (4:20), The Hook (10:30), Cycle Breakdown (30:20), Month 12 (34:20), Month 11 (42:18), Month 10 (50:08), Month 9 (55:22), Month 8 (1:04:40), Month 7 (1:20:00), Month 6 (1:31:25), Month 5 (1:34:50), Month 4 (1:42:17), Month 3 (1:48:35), Month 2 (1:55:15), Month 1 (2:00:25), Overall Thoughts (2:07:00), Silver Bullet (2:15:00), and Outro (2:39:30). 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
